::Killfest::

Killfest nods, ready to follow DrillBit. The guns on his wrists begin 
to glow again. His optics also glow as they charge up, and a missile 
launcher emerges from his shoulder.

"How many bots does Megatron have on the bridge?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Agreed."
> He opens an incodded channel to his/Killfest's troops.
> "This is Commander DrillBit. Scratch that order to attck the Engine
> room. Its to risky. Everyone is to attack the Bridg. Our adjective 
is to
> kill the soldiers Megatron has there. We also hope this will draw 
Meg's
> and his main force from the engine room. Attack now.
> Killfest, lets go."
